review_text: I would absolutely keep this space in mind to use again!
Adorable place! Very comfortable. Beautiful kitchen and bath. Definitely recommend
Las Vegas NM is full of hidden gems, and this home was one of them. Well located and lovely hosts.
This is a magical place. It is a perfect retreat for a few days on your own.

This small house is very nicely decorated in a New Mexico style. The kitchen is big with lots of cooking utensils, and our host provided some fresh eggs from his chickens! The host lives just across the small yard from the house, so handy if you need anything. It was a little strange that one of the bedrooms did not have a door - just an archway into the living room. Otherwise, it was a nice place to rest after our days exploring.
Excellent, cozy home for my family and me.
Jim is a great host and made sure we have everything we need for our stay!

This is a great little house with a lot of character. It is a cozy and comfortable home and I especially loved the details of the curated decor, rugs, and furnishings throughout. The well appointed kitchen allowed us the flexibility to cook (ü•∞ the gas range and retro fridge). Beds were comfortable and access to TV, WiFi, and an assortment of books was nice for winding down once we were in for the evening. Although they had recently gotten snow, I could imagine having coffee and reading a book on the stunning sun porch had we more time in our visit. Located in a quiet neighborhood and easily walkable to the nearby Plaza. I had the chance to meet both the hosts during our stay (one at their lovely Weave+Gather shop in town and the other stopped by as I was unpacking the car) as they live/work locally. Check in and check out was easy, price was fair given the quality of the home and amenities, and the host was timely and helpful in their communication. Would absolutely stay here again.

Step into a home that feels like a hug from around the world. We had the best time simply embracing the casita~so much character and lovely decor. The hosts put a lot of love into the house, and you‚Äôll feel it! Excellent location just off the Plaza! Rachel, Jim and their beautiful home are welcome additions to the heart of Las Vegas‚ù§Ô∏è

This was a perfect spot, an easy walk to lots of shops and restaurants yet felt private and quiet. The house was very clean and cute and the beds were super comfy. The kitchen has everything you need to cook a full meal, lots of utensils and supplies and a good selection of spices. We loved the gas fireplace which kept the house cozy and the hosts were available and very nice. A really great place to stay!

Jim's home was a wonderful place!! very warm and inviting, super comfortable!! Jim is such a nice guy, very helpful with all of my questions!! with as much as i travel to Las Vegas, I will definitely be checking to see if this home is available from now on!!! Thanks for being so awesome!!
Great place had great stay
Jim‚Äôs home was awesome and nice. Worked perfect for us with tons of great decor. All areas of the home was clean and stocked well. Felt like home. Thanks again.

Vegas is a charming town and Jim's house was such a pleasure to stay in! A couple of blocks from the town green, close to everything yet completely quiet at night for the best sleep. Soft sheets and towels, bright kitchen and front sun room, just perfect. Loved it!
Beautiful refurbished space with beautiful finishes and furnishings, in walking distance from the Las Vegas plaza. Great communication and flexibility were also a plus. Thank you Jim and Rachel!

Such a lovely place to stay, great location, very walkable to plaza and restaurants nearby. Beautifully decorated, lovely feel in the home. Great kitchen, bathroom/shower, sleeping and seating areas. Would love to go back and stay again! It was a perfect place to stay whilst in Las Vegas, close to so many things, appreciated the walkability!

Highly recommended.
Jim was as friendly and accommodating a host as they come, and the home was both beautiful and immaculate. Location is perfect - walking distance to the historic plaza but tucked away off a side street down in a shady grove, plenty of peace and quiet.
We'll be back!
Was exactly what we needed .

Jim & Rachel did a great job preparing this spot for my arrival! We had a torrential hail storm the day I arrived and the casita held up really well! Would love to visit again. Be sure to check out their shop!

Jim & Rachel's Downtown Bungalow was a better than expected in LV delight. Historic bungalow is freshly renovated, the kitchen & bath are bright & beautifully appointed with all one could want. Lovely antiques, intriguing books & ethnic textiles throughout - learn more about by visiting their shop, Weave & Gather, on the Plaza, a treat of local & rare imported treasures. Appreciated energy conservative appliances & heat pumps that maintained VERY comfortable temp in near 100 weather. Rachel even gave me a compost bucket. Will recommend & return. Thank you for a great time!
Enjoyed the stay! Close to everything but still private and quiet.
We had a great time. Perfect location and great feel to the home. Will stay there again.

Beautiful historic casita just minutes from downtown. We enjoyed our stay and all the cozy amenities. The hosts were very welcoming and accommodating of our needs. We can‚Äôt wait to visit again soon!

This was a great place to stay! Comfortable space and very clean. The hosts were extremely friendly and responsive. The location is great! There are several shops and restaurants within walking distance. I would highly recommend staying here!

This bungalow is much nicer than the pictures show! The surroundings are lovely and the overall setting is peaceful and isolated, but a short walkable distance to the plaza. Jim was friendly and available when needed. My husband and I highly recommend this gem in Las Vegas.

Super sweet bungalow just steps off the central plaza in Las Vegas, yet feels like you're in the countryside. Jim and Rachel have thought of everything. Cozy couch in front of the fireplace, fully stocked kitchen, comfy beds, interesting books, and lovely artwork and plants. Highly recommended.

We loved our stay at the bungalow, Jim and Rachel were kind, thoughtful and very helpful hosts. The house was beautiful and easy to stay at, only one minute from the plaza for restaurants and plenty of things to do. We especially loved the kitchen which had every amenity we needed. The bathroom was beautiful and had our favorite local spa's shampoo and conditioner. The living areas had plenty of books, games and gorgeous art. It was so restful to stay there. We will definitely be staying here again! Thank you Jim and Rachel for making our trip so much easier, beautiful and peaceful.

We are so pleased with our stay -
Jim and Rachel treated us so well. We were greeted with fresh eggs from their coop, and fresh produce. This is a beautiful clean and cozy historic home that they have renovated and decorated with amazing fiber textiles and photos. It‚Äôs got a wonderful kitchen. While it‚Äôs so conveniently one block from downtown and a quick walk to the university, their home has a wonderful sense of privacy. It‚Äôs one of two homes on this acre-sized farm with fruit trees and chickens. The boxer Jack Johnson stayed and trained at the next door neighbor‚Äôs house :) Jim and Rachel also own a really beautiful fiber textiles store downtown and will be offering weaving courses, and yoga retreats. We loved our stay in the city of LasVegas and can‚Äôt wait to return.
Colin‚Äôs home was very clean and peaceful. House was great for a work trip.

Colin was great! We had a great time at the Ranch. The location was perfect and not too far from town. Thank you for the brunch and helping with other accommodations. We appreciate you. We highly recommend it, and will be back!

What a great stay! The Leaping Deer Ranch was beautiful in its entirety, with comfortable, spatious, clean and well maintained accommodations and a great overall energy. We particularly enjoyed exploring the nearby ridge and cave (watch out for cacti!) with our children, under the guidance of the adorable dog Fluffy. The horses and deer on property were friendly and enjoyable. The impressive Labyrinth, yoga deck and general vibes of the area contributed to a great spiritual energy to our stay. Colin was an attentive and gracious host. We highly recommend and will definitely come back!
The home was spacious and sprawling. Lots of bedrooms to fit a lot of people comfortably. My family was able to stay in one place and relax together. Beautiful scenery and peaceful.
Great place for a work retreat - it was a beautiful opportunity for us to reconnect as a team.

This is everything the description. A pristine ranch/retreat center off the beaten path with all of the amenities that you will need. Full kitchen (really nice dishes and utilities), a fully functioning hot tub, and acres upon acres to explore. Go explore the local towns and enjoy the day time excursions, but at night make sure to light the fire and enjoy the clear night sky. I took a group of 10 people here to get away from the craziness of every day life, and Leaping Deer did just that. You are going to love the place so much that you will want your own Leaping Deer swag. Colin is around when needed and happy to answer any questions. He even stayed up late for us to drive into town during a rather tough blizzard with whiteout conditions. Can‚Äôt say enough about how incredible this stay was. I fully recommend Leaping Deer Ranch
Amazing place for a big company. Very private and beautiful. Colin is a very responsive and helpful host. Great stay overall!

We had the most wonderful vacation at the ranch! Colin and all the either are so kind and helpful. The home itself was spacious, well decorated and stocked with anything you could need and the property was breathtakingly beautiful. We can‚Äôt wait to back!

Leaping Deer Ranch is spacious both inside and outside. It was perfect for our large family gathering. Recent heavy snows made getting our van down the road a little tricky but luckily Colin was there to lend a hand. We really enjoyed our stay, from the friendly dog Fluffy to visits to the horses to hiking the ridge to the cozy fireplace.
Great place

We absolutely love this place! This was our second year here for a family get together.This place is so peaceful and beautiful. We loved exploring the property and the star gazing was amazing, especially from the hot tub. This house is so well stocked. The kitchen had plenty of spices and gadgets. There are lots of towels and extra blankets. There are several areas for sitting, visiting and plenty of space to spread out. This is such a good place to relax. We hope to make it an annual destination.

This is by far the most grand house we have stayed in. The design, views, lighting, decor, unique artworks, and the expansive nature of the rooms are all outstanding. The photos do not do it justice. Not to mention the beauty and tranquility of the ranch itself! I cannot leave out the stunning night sky which was among the best we‚Äôve seen. This home is a unique blend of luxury and comfort in a beautiful natural setting. New Mexico at its best. Would highly recommend.
Great location!

Wonderful stay with Colin and the rest of the staff. The property is truly stunning. Peaceful. Spacious. Very relaxing. Inside was beautiful and comfortable for our larger party. All amenities as described. We made day trips into Taos and Santa Fe. Would love to come back for spa services.

Leaping Deer Ranch perfectly accommodated our group of 9 guys who were visiting New Mexico on an annual retreat. The ranch is very unique and has many things to do. Colin & team were very accommodating during our time - with pig roast, fresh chicken eggs, shooting range, on site massages. We hope to be back!
Fantastic getaway for our group. Highly recommend the Wild Sol Sanctuary onsite as well.

We knew exactly what we wanted when we booked our place. We wanted a ranch with space and Colin‚Äôs place was exactly that. It was conveniently located between Taos and Santa Fe. It was beautiful and quiet and we couldn‚Äôt be happier! Thank you very much!
Matt

We were in town with a film crew and the space was great for our group. Lots of space, comfortable bedrooms, and big community areas for us to work and hang out. Colin was easy to communicate with and was quick to address any issues or questions that came up.

This is my 4th time staying at Leaping Deer Ranch and can‚Äôt say enough good things about the place and the staff. Colin is A+ and I got to meet Shami (sp). The ranch itself is beautiful and each time I visit there seems to be more amenities added. Outdoor movie theatre is now operational. My favorite thing to do is grab a drink and sit on the porch on the wheel bench to watch the setting Sun well into dusk and listen to the crickets. If you ever want to explore northern New Mexico, give Leaping Dear Ranch a try.
Great stay at the ranch. Colin was great. We‚Äôd love to come back!

This is a wonderful location for a large group of people. Everyone had plenty of space and the accommodations were excellent. I would book this location again in the future. My family had a very good time!

The Leaping Deer Ranch is a GREAT place to get-away. Although it appears to be used for larger wedding parties and gatherings, my wife and I were lucky enough to be able to book it for a 4 night anniversary getaway. All was as described in the listing. Colin is responsive and lives on-site. We didn't even scratch the surface of the available outdoor opportunities. A beautiful 20 mile drive to Mora, and a simple 10 mile drive to Las Vegas, you have access to anything you might need. Booking a massage on-site is HIGHLY recommended. Looking forward to a return trip in the warmer months.

Had a family reunion for the second time at Leaping Deer Ranch, great location convenient to Red River, Santa Fe, and lots of great time spent on the ranch just enjoying family. A buetigul spot to get away!

An amazing and beautiful placed villa with immense privacy. I was able to have a ladies/my bachelorette weekend here and it was everything I dreamed of and more!! Everything you need is accessible and the owners are nearby for any help :) 11/10 would recommend!!

Leaping Deer Ranch was the perfect location for our small outdoor wedding! Due to COVID-19, we needed to keep our wedding small, and the ranch was the perfect size to accommodate ourselves and our 9 guests. The ranch is spacious and well decorated, which made the perfect backdrop for our reception; the large dining room table was even able to comfortably seat the 11 of us! The location of the ranch is about 1.5-2 hours from an airport, depending on if you fly into Santa Fe or Albuquerque, so our guests rented cars and there was ample parking at the ranch. The ranch is also located ~15 minutes from Las Vegas, NM, which was incredibly convenient for getting groceries. We ordered our reception dinner from The Skillet in Las Vegas, which is a restaurant/bar that also hosts karaoke Thursday nights at 9; the food was delicious and karaoke was a blast! Leaping Deer is also just a great place for hanging out and relaxing. We spent a lot of time in the hot tub, gazing at the stars - we even saw shooting stars! The land itself is stunning and has spectacular views, especially when you hike up the hillside with Fluffy the adorable resident malamute. Our first night there we were also treated to a giant double rainbow right out in front of the ranch! There were a few hiccups here and there, such as the refrigerator in the kitchen being broken, so we relied on a smaller one that was kindly setup for us on the porch. Also, one of our guests found a scorpion in their room, so be careful to always shut doors behind you and don't open windows without screens. All in all, we had a wonderful stay and we're very grateful to Colin and the crew for such a pleasant time!

This place is amazing. The house is very roomy and big enough for a large gathering. The kitchen is well stocked. Everything was very clean and the descriptions as accurate. The view in the morning is gorgeous.

This place is exactly what we needed! I came with 6 other friends to find a refuge from our city lives for the month of February. The house is spacious so we all had plenty of space; the property is huge and a lot of fun to explore, with curious horses and a playful husky wandering around as well. Would highly recommend.
Great place to stay.

The Leaping Deer Ranch was the perfect family getaway. We skipped the beach and decided to do a socially distant trip out west, and the ranch did not disappoint! The house was so large that everyone had their own room, with many empty to spare, giving us some much-needed space after months of quarantining together. We enjoyed the extremely well-appointed kitchen, the seemingly endless covered porch, the majestic sunrises across the landscape, and the cozy fireplaces. The kids enjoyed our daily hikes around the property, climbing to find the cave, collecting eggs, and feeding the horses with Colin. We were sad to leave and only wish we could have stayed longer!
This ranch was clean and rooms comfy.

Truly a beautiful and private getaway! Everything you need is there. The kitchen is fully stocked with cookware and appliances, even a Kitchen Aid mixer, and Vita Mix blender. I loved the large professional gas stove. The beds and bedding were very comfortable. Sleeping there was fantastic. Colin is a great host. He provides a private,
professional atmosphere and offers complete privacy. We felt very safe.

We had such an amazing time for my husband 50th! The home was spacious and clean. The staff was amazing and helpful. We collected eggs with the kids and went in search of horses. We hiked to the cave and the guys shot guns at the private range. These guys really went out of their way to make our trip amazing and I can‚Äôt thank them enough. The kids had no need for iPads as they had so much outdoor adventures. As adults we had plenty of space to unwind and enjoy the stunning view. You won‚Äôt be disappointed if you book here.

My friends and I had a lovely stay at the ranch. It was just five of us and we used our time to relax, explore the property, and cook. The kitchen is exceptionally well stocked, and we were able to cook and bake delicious things without any problems. I highly recommend this Airbnb!

Leaping Deer Ranch is absolutely stunning & the perfect place for a family or friend reunion. Our party included three generations with two grandparents, two sets of parents, & four kids ranging from 5 to 1 year old. The house is so spacious that everyone commented on how we could easily double the size of our party without any issue. Plus it‚Äôs very kid & dog friendly. The kitchen is incredibly well-stocked with appliances, serving ware, & other kitchen essentials (spices, cooking oils, coffee filters, paper towels, etc). The eight-person hot tub is a huge plus & only adds to the luxurious feel of the place. I hope to be back soon & highly recommend Leaping Deer Ranch for its beautiful views of NM vistas, its relaxing vibes, & its come as you are attitude.
Leapong Deer Ranch offered an amazing setting for my wedding. It had everything to offer! You will not regret booking here!
The ranch house is beautiful, with views for miles. There are lots of places to relax and recharge while enjoying the mountain vistas of northern NM. We had a wonderful stay!
From the moment we arrived to the time we checked out we completely enjoyed our stay. Everything was super clean. Everyone had their own space to spread out and do their own thing.

Absolutely magical! We stayed at the ranch for a few nights to celebrate two birthdays and we have an amazing time! The picture do not do it justice, everything is very well thought out and Collin and everyone else who works there are super helpful and willing to do whatever they can to make it a memorable experience. We already booked our next trip!
Such a great experience staying at Colins place. We wouldn‚Äôt have changed anything! Very comfortable and very clean. Will definitely come again!
Beautiful property and house. The hummingbirds were so much fun to watch. My kids loved having their own bedrooms and bathrooms.

We came to LDR to host our wedding - due to COVID, we postponed. When we decided to keep our reservation for a romantic getaway, we discovered LDR was a magical, tranquil, and fascinating place - cathedral ceilings, intricate tile work, a fully stocked kitchen, the most majestic night sky, and fresh eggs right from the coop. Colin and crew were hospitable yet gave us full privacy...plus Fluffy is a delight. We will return!
Tranquil and quiet. Nice spot to unwind and enjoy the big sky.

What a beautiful place - we really enjoyed our time at Leaping Deer Ranch. Our kids loved exploring the property, including the chickens, horses, and Fluffy the ranch dog. Collin and team were very helpful and our stay was the get-away we needed. Hope we get the chance to come back some day.

Amazing panoramic views from worlds best front porch! Feels like your own private luxury resort. Spacious and spotless.
Owner is super thoughtful and kind.

We loved our stay at Leaping Deer Ranch. I couldn't have asked for a more accommodating location to hold our wedding ceremony and reception. We are both into the outdoors but knew we needed to provide comfort and amenities to our guests. Thus, making Leaping Deer Ranch a perfect location for our wedding. Colin (the owner) is extremely professional and the staff were all very helpful. The Master Bedroom has the biggest bathtub I've ever seen. A nice bubble bath was perfect addition to ease away my stress the day before the wedding . Also, the kitchen is a Professional Chef's dream come true! We didn't have our event catered but with the help of this spacious kitchen we were able to prepare enough food (and more) for all 57 of our guests.
My wife and I had a great time here along with our puppy. Was super clean, the property the house is located on was great, and lots of hiking within an hour of the VRBO.

What a phenomenal experience! This place is 186 acres of magic! We took multiple walks to the gate daily for exercise/view (.65 miles each way). We fed the four friendly horses that roam the property (often times exploring). We ate fresh eggs daily and got to get them from the chickens themselves. We hiked the mountain behind the big house and found a cool cave and a giant hole we called, "The Pit of Doom" (it sounds scarier than it is haha). We enjoyed each other's company (was kind of like a family reunion - 13 of us at one point including 6 adults and 7 children; youngest was 4 and it was totally appropriate/not dangerous). We relaxed in the jacuzzi. We ran, we played, we cooked. We shot our pellet gun and crossbow at the range. It was such a special time. Colin was fantastic. At first, the thought of "sharing" the ranch didn't seem as appealing. However, we were happy Colin was there and really hardly saw him! There are folks that work there as well, but we hardly saw them too (and they were super friendly when we did). It was a relief Colin was there when we realized we needed things (eggs, horse treats, etc.). It was also nice to get a tour of the place at check-in. We felt like we had the best of both worlds - hospitality and privacy.
Leaping Deer Ranch is magical. We hope to return and I highly recommend you stay there.
We loved our stay here! There are so many places to explore and great views. Fresh eggs in the morning from the chicken coup and a hot tub to relax.

This place is amazing. It was so peaceful and quiet. The kids had a wonderful time exploring. There was tons of room. They got to feed the chickens and get eggs. Go on hikes every day. Couldn‚Äôt be better.

This ranch is gorgeous, with beautiful views from the ridge and comfortable spaces all over the house, indoors and out. Our large family group of 12 adults and 6 little kids was able to spread out and be comfortable with almost no need to ever leave except to buy more groceries (just 10 miles away!). So much room to play, hike, rest. And the hot tub was large and comfortable for a small crowd.
The kitchen was fantastic for a big group who loves to cook. We really enjoyed the huge range and the convection oven, and the wine fridge!
The place is quality, and a really good price. Colin and his team were accommodating and helpful. HIGHLY recommend this place for a large group gathering or family reunion.

Colin's ranch is amazing. We were there for a weekend getaway with friends and it couldn't have been more perfect, from the lovely views, the clear night sky, and the very sweet ranch dog, Fluffy, that greeted us. The rooms were palatial, clean, and plentiful. Thanks again!
Beautiful home. Not very clean. The host made me feel really unwanted, he was very worried about the next guests coming. I had higher expectations.

We used this space for a retreat for our chorus. Everything was amazing and we had everything we needed. Colin built us a bonfire and we sang around the fire and made s‚Äômores. It was a great weekend!

This home was perfect for our group of ten women. We had enough different spaces in the house to play games, cook together in the wonderful kitchen, all sit together at meals, complete a puzzle, read, crochet, and generally relax. The sleeping accommodations are very comfortable and the staff was very helpful. We enjoyed a nice fire in the fireplace and appreciated being resupplied with wood. We will return!

Leaping Deer is such a gorgeous, wonderful place! My husband and I got married here and I went to the ranch for my bachelorette party. Both were amazing experiences. Colin and Matt are great, helpful hosts, and Fluffy is an excellent hiking companion.

This was my family‚Äôs second time spending Christmas at the Leaping Deer Ranch and it was once again, a great experience. We all wished we could spend another week there. It‚Äôs clean, it‚Äôs comfortable, the kitchen is a dream for cooking for large groups, and Colin and the other folks on the property are very friendly. I took the time to walk through the labyrinth and it was so cool! It must have taken a lot of effort to build it and I‚Äôve never seen anything like it.

We thoroughly enjoyed spending our family Christmas at this beautiful, spacious ranch. There were 16 of us and we never felt crowded. We enjoyed soaking in the hot tub, hiking in the hills behind the house, walking the labyrinth, visiting the horses and exploring the surrounding area.

Loved the getaway. Beautiful home. Comfortable. Once we arrived, we unloaded and never left. It was a lovely space to relax, spend time with my family, and have access to so much space and adventure. Loved it. Will go back.

Beautiful and luxurious home with the best sunrise and sunset! My friends and I (n = 9) did a writing and yoga retreat for 5 nights.This was the best place to do it. One of it‚Äôs best kept secrets is Colin‚Äôs cooking. I highly recommend that people who stay here hire the host to prepare their meals. Breakfast, lunch and dinner! They were able to accommodate our different culinary needs - vegan, vegetarian and carnivores. And some of us had the chocolate cake Colin baked for our first night and some said it was the best they have ever had!
Lovely setting with ample amenities! Our large family includes children, teens, and fur babies; we ALL enjoyed our stay!

We had our wedding at Colin‚Äôs ranch this past weekend and wow I cannot say enough positive things about Colin himself, his ranch hand Matt, and the ranch as a whole.
Not only us, who were partial to the ranch from the start, but every other person who attended our wedding this weekend spoke highly of the ranch and its natural beauty. We all absolutely loved the house, too. The kitchen allowed us to cook breakfast together and enjoy the community of our friends in the days leading up to the wedding and after. The fireplace in the front entrance was perfect for sharing old stories and laughing together. The formal dining room was picturesque and perfect for signing our marriage license in as well as for sharing meals and memories with friends and family. The master bedroom was INCREDIBLE. The tub large enough to comfortably fit two adults was icing on the cake! The bed and pillows were a dream to sleep on, and the candles that were made available throughout the space added a beautiful sense of romance to the place.
My new husband and I enjoyed the rooster crows through the entire weekend and Fluffy, the ranch dog, made each part of the weekend that much more fun. We love dogs and fluffy was perfect have around. She spent time with us on the porch, visited us during our reception, and played with us and our bridal party in one of the grass fields during our photo session just after the ceremony.
Colin and Matt even attended a post-reception bonfire and shared some great stories. Colin also talked to us about the meaningfulness of having our marriage at the center of the rock labyrinth. We were not able to walk the labyrinth in entirety during our stay this time, but we would absolutely love to return with more family and friends in the future to walk the labyrinth make more memories at this beautiful and very special ranch.
Thank you both for a perfect stay.

Was a great few days with extended family, and Colin was a great host. The atmosphere is very relaxed and captures the New Mexico vibe well. Was really great having Fluffy accompany us on hikes around the property.
One of the best Airbnb experiences I‚Äôve ever had. Colin is an amazing host and his property is such a beautiful place.

We were looking for a rustic venue, in a majestic setting, for my daughter's wedding where we could house and host a large group of people. Leaping Deer Ranch was perfect. The location of the ranch is nestled in the hills with sweeping vistas. There was a lot of space to gather and relax and on the porches surrounding the ranch house. The kitchen and great room easily accommodate 50+ people . The Kitchen itself had everything we needed including multiple ovens and dishwashers and utensils. Colin was very attentive and quick to respond if we needed anything. All in all , we had a great experience. If you are looking for a secluded, rural location with access to hotels and stores, as well as, hiking and hot springs then Leaping Deer Ranch is your place.

Leaping Deer Ranch is a true gem! We recently had our wedding here and it was everything we dreamed of and more!
Colin is a great host and his property is immaculate. You can feel the hard work and love that he puts into the space. He was extremely helpful in answering our questions and accommodating our needs. He is easy going and truly wants his guests to enjoy their stay.
The ranch housed our entire families comfortably. We had a beautiful ceremony in the outdoor labyrinth and a fun reception in the event hall. We were able to customize the space to our liking and it was great to have tables, chairs, linens, and place settings already available.
The ranch has many other special touches. We enjoyed the beautiful fiber art in the house, the hot tub, fresh eggs from the chickens, visits from the hummingbirds, hikes led by the house dog, Fluffy, the horses, and star gazing at night.
You will enjoy every minute of your stay here. It is so peaceful and serene. We will definitely be back again!

Leaping Deer Ranch is an experience rather than a place to stay. The grounds are lovely and beckon to be walked and the house has charm, comfort, and art to take in in every room. The hot tub was a fabulous way to unwind after an eventful day. We had our wedding and rehearsal dinner at the ranch and all our guests commented on the beautiful landscape and property. Every one thoroughly enjoyed their stay and Colin was always prompt with answers and available if we had a need. Overall, we had an amazing stay at Leaping Deer!

Our experience at Leaping Deer Ranch was absolutely amazing. After searching through over 30 other venues, we finally found this oasis of tranquility. Colin was a fantastic, and attentive host. From the start, Colin helped us with information about the property & specifics that were invaluable to the planning. From working with the caterer to helping us accommodate our 12 guests, to building a frame for our group activity, he was always gracious, patient and friendly. The property, regardless of the beautiful photos on the advertisement, is understated. Every guest at attendance was blown away by the beauty, peacefulness, and amenities of this wonderful property. We highly recommend Leaping Deer Ranch to any couple or business looking for an event venue. It will probably be considerably less expensive compared to other comparable locations, without sacrificing any of the luxury. A+

My wife and I had our wedding at Colin‚Äôs ranch and wow, I simply cannot express enough what an incredibly picturesque space it has turned out to be. The ranch is peaceful, enormous, and gorgeously appointed. We would watch the hummingbirds every morning before coffee and got some simply incredible pictures on the grounds. The event space is completely stocked with chairs, plates, etc. Perfect for hosting an event. :) Finally, there was not a single thing we wanted for the entire weekend. Colin is brilliant and kind, and his story with the ranch is an inspiring one. Would absolutely recommend. :)

Leaping Deer Ranch is a fantastic stay for a family getaway! Breathtaking views and a friendly host made our stay perfect. We loved how everyone in our family had their own space to relax and other spaces to get together and hang out
We had a wonderful stay in an exceptional home. Colin is a perfect host and provides a relaxing and stress free environment.We are looking forward to our next visit!
Third consecutive year staying at the ranch. Great place for a large group extended stay, or just a couple nights along the way, like my group. Relaxing.

Leaping Deer Ranch was the perfect place for our wedding, and spending a long weekend with friends & family. Colin was great and very accommodating, helping to make our day perfect.
The ranch is spacious with spectacular views from every direction. The fully stocked kitchen and grill allowed us to cook for our big group and enjoy spending time with everyone with plenty of space.
We had sides catered for the reception through the Skillet (in Las Vegas), in combination with a roasted pig that Colin and team took care of for us on property. Everything was delicious!
So many of our friends and family told us it's the best wedding they've been to, and we have Colin & Leaping Deer to thank for a big part of that. It was our best day ever. Thank you!
Lots of space. Great kitchen. Many nearby places for excursions.

The ranch house was spacious and clean. The main kitchen has a lot of cupboard and counter space and has 3 sinks!
